body_html: @SsnL, @soumith - I fixed the script at our end by installing mkl in the docker image first, and adding the header file locations to the cmake include path. The packages are quite big (~2.5 gigs) though, and it will be great if we can include this in the docker image itself.
body_text: @SsnL, @soumith - I fixed the script at our end by installing mkl in the docker image first, and adding the header file locations to the cmake include path. The packages are quite big (~2.5 gigs) though, and it will be great if we can include this in the docker image itself.
body: @SsnL, @soumith - I fixed the script at our end by installing mkl in the docker image first, and adding the header file locations to the cmake include path. The packages are quite big (~2.5 gigs) though, and it will be great if we can include this in the docker image itself.
